# Immediate Assistance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One willing creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 108

*As you speak the arcane words, you feel the laws of reality bending around your companion, undoing his failure.*

You grant the subject the chance to reroll a skill check. You must cast this spell after the skill check has been rolled, but before success or failure has been determined. The subject makes the new check immediately and must abide by the results of the second roll. The subject can't take 10 or 20 on this reroll.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 1, Witch 1, Wizard 1 to Level.
